languages.text: Капитан "Бессердечного" зажат в угол. Пора заставить его ответить за свои преступления.

traits.locale_text: Капитан "Бессердечного" зажат в угол. Пора заставить его ответить за свои преступления.

languages.text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.
languages.original_text: Капитан "Бессердечного" зажат в угол. Пора заставить его ответить за свои преступления.

traits.locale_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It's time to make him answer for his crimes.

languages.text: ハートレスのキャプテンは追い詰められている。彼に自らの罪の償いをさせる時だ。
languages.original_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.

traits.locale_text: ハートレスのキャプテンは追い詰められている。彼に自らの罪の償いをさせる時だ。

languages.text: Der Captain der Heartless ist umstellt. Es ist Zeit, dass er für seine Verbrechen gerichtet wird.
languages.original_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.

traits.locale_text: Der Captain der Heartless ist umstellt. Es ist Zeit, dass er für seine Verbrechen gerichtet wird.

languages.text: Le capitaine du Sans-Cœur est acculé. Il est temps pour lui de répondre de ses crimes.
languages.original_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.

traits.locale_text: Le capitaine du Sans-Cœur est acculé. Il est temps pour lui de répondre de ses crimes.

languages.text: El capitán de la Desalmada está acorralado. Ha llegado la hora de que responda por sus crímenes.
languages.original_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.

traits.locale_text: El capitán de la Desalmada está acorralado. Ha llegado la hora de que responda por sus crímenes.

languages.text: 无心号的舰长已经被逼入绝境，是时候让他为他犯下的罪行付出代价了。
languages.original_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.

traits.locale_text: 无心号的舰长已经被逼入绝境，是时候让他为他犯下的罪行付出代价了。

languages.text: Taşkalp'in kaptanı köşeye sıkıştı. Suçlarının hesabını verme vakti geldi.
languages.original_text: The captain of the Heartless is cornered. It is time to make him answer for his crimes.

traits.locale_text: Taşkalp'in kaptanı köşeye sıkışmıştır. Suçlarının hesabını verme vakti gelmiştir.
